Description: Papyrus containing 15 lines of Greek text on the recto and an illegible address on the verso. The text contains a letter to a man named Ischyrion.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (380646) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/380646)
Previous owner: Previous owner/ex-collection: Colgate Rochester Divinity School
Additional IDs: Miscellaneous number: P.Oxy. XIV 1675 (text edition abbreviation according to Oates et al 2001)
